definitions.definition: At what time? At which time? Upon which occasion or circumstance? Used to introduce direct or indirect questions about time.
examples: Do you know when they arrived?
I don't know when they arrived.

subdefinitions.definition: Used after a noun or noun phrase in isolation to express impatience with an anticipated future event.
examples: The site's all bugged. Fix when ?
My fridge even restocks itself these days. Glorious AI overlords when ?

definitions.definition: At an earlier time and under different, usually less favorable, circumstances.
examples: He's mister high and mighty now, but I remember him when .

definitions.definition: At which , on which, during which: often omitted or replaced with that .
examples: That was the day when the Twin Towers fell.
Not a week goes by when I don't mourn that loss.

definitions.definition: The time at, on or during which.
examples: I recall when they were called the Greys.
Next year is when we elect a new mayor.

definitions.definition: A circumstance or situation in which.
examples: Love is when you can't get enough of someone.

main_definition: ( interrogative ) At what time? At which time? Upon which occasion or circumstance? Used to introduce direct or indirect questions about time.
secondary_definitions: At an earlier time and under different, usually less favorable, circumstances.
( relative ) At which , on which, during which: often omitted or replaced with that .
( fused relative ) The time at, on or during which.
( informal , in definitions or explanations ) A circumstance or situation in which.
